description: Roll Food is an innovative company founded less than five years ago, focusing on sustainable food processing. It emerged from a project involving cooperatives in Argentina, aiming to revitalize local economies by utilizing discarded produce. With a commitment to quality, Roll Food specializes in dehydrated and canned products, leveraging advanced technology and renewable energy. The company emphasizes democratizing access to healthy food while maintaining high standards, and it has received multiple awards for its contributions to the food industry.
name: Roll Food
